data.lyric:
[ti:Hate The Other Side (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/Marshmello/Polo G/The Kid LAROI]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hate The Other Side (Explicit) - Juice WRLD/Marshmello (棉花糖)/The Kid LAROI/Polo G
[00:01.86]Lyrics by：Marshmello/Charlton Howard/David Lynn Moody/Jarad Higgins/Niles Hollowell-Dhar/Taurus Bartlett
[00:03.73]Composed by：Marshmello/Charlton Howard/David Lynn Moody/Jarad Higgins/Niles Hollowell-Dhar/Taurus Bartlett
[00:05.60]Pain whoa
[00:08.27]
[00:09.49]Mello made it right
[00:10.45]I got pain in my heart I told you a hundred times
[00:19.18]Yeah
[00:21.15]I got pain in my heart I told you a hundred times
[00:23.89]But it's money money money money money on my mind
[00:26.52]Put a beam on the glizzy don't get caught between the lines
[00:29.23]Last n***a we got busy on got hit between the eyes
[00:31.85]Roll my problems in a Backwood and put it in the sky
[00:34.57]Got your mans in this Backwood put it in the sky
[00:37.17]I was taught to love my brothers and to hate the other side
[00:40.24]Hate the other side hate the other side
[00:41.98]Boujee off the ecstasy I might act woo uh
[00:44.81]I lost gang members I can't act cool uh
[00:47.53]I got gang scriptures in my tattoos
[00:49.86]I was runnin' from the police in my trap shoes
[00:52.51]Posted tryna flip a hundred I couldn't buy food
[00:55.10]Come from nothin' but I blossomed to a tycoon
[00:57.62]Betrayal scars can't stop thinkin' 'bout them stab wounds
[01:00.48]We might not catch him today but he gon' die soon
[01:02.97]I'm from Chicago she said she like my accent
[01:05.62]I'm from Chicago where Glock's what we react with
[01:08.56]Stand him tall make him tumble when that MAC spit
[01:10.92]B***h I'm a gangster I just took off from some rap s**t
[01:13.61]Off from some rap s**t
[01:14.56]I got pain in my heart I told you a hundred times
[01:17.26]But it's money money money money money on my mind
[01:19.85]Put a beam on the glizzy don't get caught between the lines
[01:22.51]Last n***a we got busy on got hit between the eyes
[01:25.12]Roll my problems in a Backwood and put it in the sky
[01:27.83]Got your mans in this Backwood put it in the sky
[01:30.54]I was taught to love my brothers and to hate the other side
[01:33.53]Hate the other side
[01:34.52]Yeah
[01:34.81]Hate the other side
[01:36.23]Hate the other side
[01:37.29]Side
[01:37.58]Hate the other side
[01:38.49]Could give a f**k about a b***h got too much money on my mind
[01:41.31]S**t I heard they was lookin' for me I'm not hard to find
[01:43.84]Everybody that I'm with got nothin' to lose b***h they gon' ride
[01:46.61]Saw my uncle in the grave that brought tears to my eyes
[01:49.10]But I ain't gon lie
[01:49.88]I've done been through this s**t too many times
[01:51.86]My heart's still tryna recover from pain all my life
[01:54.60]I've really been through hell and back a couple hundred times
[01:57.60]Couple hundred times read between the lines
[01:59.78]I'm still tryin' I'm still tryin' to get by
[02:02.35]Get by
[02:02.57]I still got memories that lay deep inside
[02:05.38]Repent up on my mind
[02:06.81]It's f**king up my life
[02:07.84]I got pain in my heart I told you a hundred times
[02:10.56]But it's money money money money money on my mind
[02:13.19]Put a beam on the glizzy don't get caught between the lines
[02:15.88]Last n***a we got busy on got hit between the eyes
[02:18.62]Roll my problems in a Backwood and put it in the sky
[02:21.13]Got your mans in this Backwood put it in the sky
[02:23.81]I was taught to love my brothers and to hate the other side
[02:26.86]Hate the other side hate the other side
data.trans:
[ti:Hate The Other Side (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD/Marshmello/Polo G/The Kid LAROI]
[al:Legends Never Die (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.86]//
[00:03.73]//
[00:05.60]痛苦不堪
[00:08.27]
[00:09.49]Marshmello制作
[00:10.45]我心里感觉很痛苦 我告诉过你一百次
[00:19.18]//
[00:21.15]我心里感觉很痛苦 我告诉过你一百次
[00:23.89]但我脑海里想的全是钱
[00:26.52]手枪装上瞄准镜 做事不要太过分
[00:29.23]上一个招惹我们的人 两眼之间多了一个洞
[00:31.85]把我的烦恼都裹在香烟里 吸几口就烟消云散
[00:34.57]把你的人统统干掉 让他们人间蒸发
[00:37.17]我从小被教育 要爱我的兄弟 要恨与我作对的人
[00:40.24]憎恨那些与我作对的人
[00:41.98]吃了那种东西 我的行为可能有点粗鲁
[00:44.81]我失去了很多兄弟 我不能做傻事
[00:47.53]我把匪帮箴言纹在我的身上
[00:49.86]我穿着专用鞋子逃避警察
[00:52.51]当初想方设法挣一百块 连吃的都买不起
[00:55.10]当初一无所有 但我现在变成了大亨
[00:57.62]被人背叛 忍不住想起那些在背后捅刀子的人
[01:00.48]我们可能今天抓不住他 但他很快就会死去
[01:02.97]我来自芝加哥 她说 她喜欢我的口音
[01:05.62]我来自芝加哥 在那里 我们一言不合就拔枪
[01:08.56]昂然伫立 MAC冲锋枪发射的时候 他跌跌撞撞
[01:10.92]碧池 我是个匪帮 我的说唱事业刚刚起步
[01:13.61]说唱事业刚起步
[01:14.56]我心里感觉很痛苦 我告诉过你一百次
[01:17.26]但我脑海里想的全是钱
[01:19.85]手枪装上瞄准镜 做事不要太过分
[01:22.51]上一个招惹我们的人 两眼之间多了一个洞
[01:25.12]把我的烦恼都裹在香烟里 吸几口就烟消云散
[01:27.83]把你的人统统干掉 让他们人间蒸发
[01:30.54]我从小被教育 要爱我的兄弟 要恨与我作对的人
[01:33.53]憎恨与我作对的人
[01:34.52]//
[01:34.81]憎恨与我作对的人
[01:36.23]憎恨与我作对的人
[01:37.29]那些人
[01:37.58]憎恨与我作对的人
[01:38.49]根本不在乎女人 我的脑海里想的都是钱
[01:41.31]我听说他们在找我 我又不难找
[01:43.84]和我在一起的每个人都不顾一切 碧池 他们会拼命
[01:46.61]看到我的伯伯躺在坟墓里 让我双眼含泪
[01:49.10]但我不会说谎
[01:49.88]我经历过这种事情太多次
[01:51.86]我的心还没有从伤痛中恢复过来
[01:54.60]我真的走过好多次鬼门关
[01:57.60]好几百次呢 好好理解我的意思
[01:59.78]我依然在努力过活
[02:02.35]过活
[02:02.57]我依然有些记忆深埋心底
[02:05.38]我的脑海里充满了悔恨
[02:06.81]这让我一生都不得安宁
[02:07.84]我心里感觉很痛苦 我告诉过你一百次
[02:10.56]但我脑海里想的全是钱
[02:13.19]手枪装上瞄准镜 做事不要太过分
[02:15.88]上一个招惹我们的人 两眼之间多了一个洞
[02:18.62]把我的烦恼都裹在香烟里 吸几口就烟消云散
[02:21.13]把你的人统统干掉 让他们人间蒸发
[02:23.81]我从小被教育 要爱我的兄弟 要恨与我作对的人
[02:26.86]憎恨那些与我作对的人
